methods.name: AccessPointIP
methods.description: Return the IP Address of access point.

methods.name: AvailableSSIDs
methods.description: Get a list of available SSIDs (Service Set Identifiers). WiFi must be enabled for this.

methods.name: BSSID
methods.description: Get current WiFi BSSID (the MAC address of the access point).

methods.name: ConfiguredSSIDs
methods.description: Get a list of configured SSIDs (Service Set Identifiers). WiFi must be enabled for this.

methods.name: ConnectSSID
methods.description: Connect to a SSID (Service Set Identifier).

methods.name: Disable
methods.description: Disable WiFi. You can hide the success message after setting the suppressSuccessMessage property to false.

methods.name: DnsServers
methods.description: Return a list of DNS servers (primary and secondary) of the current network.

methods.name: Enable
methods.description: Enable WiFi. You can hide the success message after setting the suppressSuccessMessage property to false.

methods.name: Is5GHzBandSupported
methods.description: Check, if 5 GHz Band is supported.

methods.name: IsEnabled
methods.description: Get current WiFi state: true or false.

methods.name: SSID
methods.description: Get current WiFi SSID (Service Set Identifier).

methods.name: SignalStrength
methods.description: Get signal strength (RSSI) in a range between 0 and 100.

blockProperties.name: SuppressSuccessMessage
blockProperties.description: whether Success Message should be suppressed. Used in Enable and Disable method.

name: TaifunWiFi
helpString: WiFi Manager Extension. Version 11 as of 2019-01-28 for App Inventor version nb174 and Companion version 2.50.

events.name: GotAvailableSSIDs
events.description: indicating that Available SSIDs (Service Set Identifiers) have been scanned.
